Name: Cattle
Description: Domesticated bovine farm animals that are raised for their meat, milk, or hides or for draft purposes

Name: Goats
Description: Ruminant and hollow-horned mammal belonging to the genus Capra

Name: Pigs
Description: Pigs are stout-bodied, short-legged, omnivorous mammals, with thick skin usually sparsely coated with short bristles

Name: Sheep
Description: Sheep are species of domesticated ruminant mammal, raised for its meat, milk, and wool

Name: Poultry
Description: Poultry is the name used to describe all domesticated birds. They produce meat and eggs used as food

Name: Rabbit
Description: Rabbits are small mammals with fluffy, short tails, whiskers and distinctive long ears

Name: Fish
Description: Fish are aquatic, craniate, gill-bearing animals that lack limbs with digits
